title: Pala Palakkura Lyrics Ayan
stanzas:
pala palakkura pagala nee
pada padakkara agala nee
anal adikkira pugala nee
nagalin nagala nee

mazhai adikkira mughila nee
thimir adikkira thigila nee
mana manakura agila nee
mulla malara nee

soodaga illa vittal
rathathil vegam illai
settaigal illa vittal
inimai illai
pootai thaan thaanda vittal
vannathu poochi illai
veettai nee thaanda vittal
vaanamey illai

vaana villai poley ilamayada
thinam puthumayada,
adhai anubavida
kaalam kaalamaagha
perusunggada
romba pazhasungada
nee munney munney vaada vaada

etti thodum vayadhu idhu
oru vettu kathi pol irukumm
athisayam yenna-vendral
athan iru pakkam koor-irukkum

kanavakku seyal koduthaal
andha sooriyanil sedi mulaikumm
pulangalai adakki vaithaal
dhinam pudhu pudhu
sugam kidaikumm

kaalil kothum aani
un yeni yetru kaami
pala inban vali serthu
oru mottai katti vaa nee vaa nee

idhu varai nenjil irukum
sila thunban-galai naam marappom
gadigaaram mul tholaithu
thodu vaanam varai poi varuvom

adai maazhai vaasal vanthaal
kaiyil kudai-indri vaa nanaivom
adaiyaalam-thaan thuarappom
yella desathillum poi vasipom

yenna kondu vanthom
naam yenna kondu povom
ada indha nodi podhum
va vera enna vendum vendum
